about.title: About Us
about.description: PakkuNeko is a purchasing and shipping service from Japan to Thailand. Our team lives in Japan and helps customers buy products from various websites like Mercari, Rakuten, Amazon JP. We inspect items, pack them safely, and deliver directly to you in Thailand.
about.quote: Shopping from Japan shouldn't be complicated
about.quoteDescription: Everyone should have access to quality products at fair prices, with warm service - like having a Japanese friend help you every step of the way.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: We offer purchasing service from Japan, package receiving and consolidation, international shipping, and bilingual consultation in Thai and Japanese.
faq.a2: Depends on shipping method. Air freight takes about 7-14 days, Sea freight takes about 30-45 days.
faq.a3: We accept bank transfer and other payment methods as agreed.

process.title: How It Works
process.subtitle: „ÅîÂà©Áî®ÊñπÊ≥ï
process.description: Simple 9-step process from start to delivery

step1.title: Send Product Link to Admin
step1.description: Send your Mercari / Rakuten / Amazon / Yahoo product link or image via LINE Official or Twitter

step2.title: Admin Quote + 50% Deposit Request
step2.description: Admin calculates the price based on daily exchange rate and notifies you of the deposit amount immediately

step3.title: Customer Pays Deposit
step3.description: Scan QR Code to pay, with automatic order status update

step4.title: Japan Team Purchases Immediately
step4.description: After receiving deposit, our Japan team purchases the item and sends proof of purchase for verification

step5.title: Arrives at Japan Warehouse ‚Üí Inspect ‚Üí Ship to Thailand
step5.description: When items arrive at our Japan warehouse, we photograph them, do initial inspection, update status, and pack for sea or air shipping

step6.title: Arrives in Thailand ‚Üí Sort + Weigh
step6.description: Items arriving in Thailand are sorted by order, weighed accurately, and domestic shipping cost is calculated

step7.title: Remaining Balance + Domestic Shipping Notice
step7.description: System generates remaining balance + domestic shipping cost. Pay again via QR Code

step8.title: Pack + Ship to Customer
step8.description: Once fully paid, we pack and ship via Kerry / Flash / J&T with immediate tracking number

step9.title: Customer Receives + Order Summary
step9.description: System closes the order and sends summary for customer records

cta.title: Ready to Start Shopping?
cta.description: Contact us now - just send the product link you want
